website_summaries.verdict: Easy to throw on over your clothes or suit to turn any outfit into patriotic Fourth of July wear.
pros: Large, but doesn't make smaller women fell like they are swimming in it
Easy to dress up or dress down
cons: This is a one size fits all item

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this! It fit well to where I didn’t feel like it was too small nor was I swimming in it. I am 5’5” and roughly 170#.
customer_reviews.author: Smitten from the Mitten

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely in Love with This!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I decided to buy this, it looks just as good in person as it does in the pictures! I received so many compliments when I wore this to a BBQ festival and paired it with with a navy blue dress. I am 5' 5'', 135 lbs, and a 32 DD, and this fit perfectly! I can't wait to wear this to more festivals and to wear it with pride on the 4th of July! :)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G

customer_reviews.title: patriotic kimono
customer_reviews.text: Light weight as described and nice colors but the seams are not sewn correctly so it doesn't drape and flow properly. I will have to repair to wear.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bartholomew

customer_reviews.title: Took a while to be delivered...but worth the wait
customer_reviews.text: flows and drapes. Excellent for 4th of July celebrations. I was surprised by the material. It is silky, i was thinking it was cotton. I like it silky even better. Took a while to get delivered, so if you want it right away it probably wont happen. Nice quality
customer_reviews.author: kris suitos

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: I know this is one size fits all, but it’s entirely too big! I’m 5’5 130 lbs and I drown in this thing. It’s super cute, but I wish it was just a bit smaller especially around the arm area and the length. It’s way too long for me. Feels like wearing a tent.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Not for plus size
customer_reviews.text: It’s really cute but just too small. Not meant for plus size. If you are size 20 or above, I wouldn’t purchase it. I went back and forth on this for a long time. Also it’s really short and does not flow at all. The fabric is a bit odd too.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Super bright colors, not "washed" color as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cute. Colors are brighter than I thought. I was expected a bit duller look, but they are definitely bright red and bright blue. Not what I wanted but I'll still wear it.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: I loved this for the 4th
customer_reviews.text: I loved this for the 4th! it fit like any other kimono I own. I haven't had any issues washing it, Its help up really well.
customer_reviews.author: R.K

customer_reviews.title: It's Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: It's what they said it was but maybe because I'm short (5'1"), it just doesn't look nice. I'll probably see if someone else wants it and just give it away.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: but I love this so much
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this in anticipation of the 4th of july ..but I love this so much..will be wearing it often..the fit is perfect..it does fit everyone..dress it up with slacks, dress it down with jeans or shorts or use a a bathing suit cover up..love this top..highly recommend ..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the loose flowy fit
customer_reviews.text: Love the loose flowy fit! Bought this for July 4th and got lots of compliments on it. It is very light weight and thin which is a plus for me
customer_reviews.author: Eva Ho

customer_reviews.title: A little sad because the material is somewhat almost plastic feeling
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with the colors they will bleed upon washing. A little sad because the material is somewhat almost plastic feeling. You kind of get the feeling your walking around with a rain poncho on.
customer_reviews.author: JennH

customer_reviews.title: Super patriotic!
customer_reviews.text: Got lots of compliments when I wore this on the 4th of July. Only thing I didn’t like is that the material is a little stiff at first.
customer_reviews.author: iloveamazon

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful and fits well. The only thing is the length is not as long as pictured in my opinion but that could differ for different body types.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Elizabeth Osborne

customer_reviews.title: This kimono is so pretty and quality is great
customer_reviews.text: This kimono is so pretty and quality is great, I got lots of compliments on it, just wish I could find the same style and quality in other colors/patterns.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way to big
customer_reviews.text: Item is way to big and arm Holes have a lot of extra fabric. Simply doesn’t fit well. I haven’t worn it, and do not plan to. Very unflattering fit.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Not loose fitting
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would give you a heads up on the sizing of this top. I thought it would be free flowing but it actually is not. I wear a size 10 and it should have fit allot larger for a one size fits all.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Meltzer

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Stitches on hems already coming out when I got it. Would be better if it was cotton and well made. It's not.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute 4th of July kimono
customer_reviews.text: Perfect kimono! It's a tad heavier than I expected, but it was perfectly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Walker

customer_reviews.title: Have already gone back and bought more of this product.
customer_reviews.text: Loved wearing for the Fourth of July this year. Very light and adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this but I ultimately returned it
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this but I ultimately returned it. Unfortunately it didn't fit the way the picture showed. Its a little shorter and doesn't lay right because its fairly wide. I may have kept it, but the material wasn't as sheer as I was hoping for beach cover up.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect through over when you are feeling patriotic
customer_reviews.text: Perfect through over when you are feeling patriotic. However, for plus size, it probably won't fit like the picture. It won't be as flowy.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Did not get the product you see in this picture. FALSE ADVERTISING.....NO KIMONO...I got an acrylic long sleeved lookng shirt!!!
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive this product. I got an acrylic long sleeve shirt. VERY disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: joyce

customer_reviews.title: Very flowy. Fabric was not as see through or ...
customer_reviews.text: Very flowy. Fabric was not as see through or as faded as the picture made it seem. It's not see through at all and the colors are very bright and solid.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Soooo perfect! Absolutely love it and can’t wait to wear it this summer! The colors are so pretty! I’m 5’9” and 175 lbs and it fits great!! Happy with my purchase (:
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful flag cover up
customer_reviews.text: It is lightweight comfortable and nicely made!! I wear it with everything jeans to a dress. Very happy about buying this!! I would buy it again!!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Lou Devine

customer_reviews.title: One size
customer_reviews.text: Multi functional , swimsuit cover, light weight cover and holiday bling
customer_reviews.author: jadelynn

customer_reviews.title: I love the USA
customer_reviews.text: WEARING THIS FOREVER AND ALWAYS. Beautiful, deep colors. Nice material, doesn't wrinkle too badly. Everyone was jealous and tried to steal it from during the trip I had bought this for.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlynne B.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk! Don't waste your money. The fit is small and the material is thin. Definitely does not hang well below the waist as pictured. It's not sewn very nice. Happy to be returning this!
customer_reviews.author: Robert McNees

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! My daughter wore it for "America" night at the football game. It was great!
customer_reviews.author: Wife2ATideFan

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: The worst product I’ve ever bought on amazon. Stay away. It fits nothing like the photo, the Material isn’t like the photo. The plastic pouch it came in was sticky ( like someone poured a can of coke all over it sticky!) so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect for the 4th
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for the 4th! It's very comfortable, and I received a ton of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: jinkey

customer_reviews.title: One size fit all not really its quite big. ...
customer_reviews.text: One size fit all not really its quite big. Will have to wear it only as a swimsuit cover. Diasapointed needed for a convention.
customer_reviews.author: chel

customer_reviews.title: Returned it.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item. I did read the other reviews, but had high hopes. Unfortunately the material feels like plastic. Wasn't for me.
customer_reviews.author: AndSheCooks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Nice material, light weight for summer, cute! I got lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: LeslieA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Just what I needed. And texture feels nice and cold on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Viktoria Lysenko

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the 4th
customer_reviews.text: Flowy and very pretty. I plan to use it as a coverup 4th of July.
customer_reviews.author: RHonda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'5" and it fits me exactly like the model shown, love it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Very light, true to picture
customer_reviews.text: Lite material, not super high quality but good value. Bought to wear to a Memorial Day Festival- got lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: GalAboutTown

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: SUPER CUTE! and impressed with how well it's made with the cost of it!
customer_reviews.author: Teaford

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Totally cute! It will be perfect for 4th of July celebrations.
customer_reviews.author: LBailey

customer_reviews.title: I really like this one
customer_reviews.text: I really like this one! The material is a little more thick than i would have liked (it's not sheer like pictures) But over all fit and quality is nice!
customer_reviews.author: Shelbi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The picture looks like the material is cotton but it’s more of a rayon
customer_reviews.author: Shelley B

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Material is a bit odd. But color is ok, fit was normal.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Mclellan

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t wait to wear it with some cute shorts and crop too 😁❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what it appeared in picture
customer_reviews.text: The kimono was not what it appeared in picture, it was not as flowly and see through as depicted, will be returning
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: It is see thru.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the flow! It looks very cute with shorts or jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on this!! I love it and it’s great for any day but especially the upcoming holiday!
customer_reviews.author: Savanna L

customer_reviews.title: Only buy if you are small
customer_reviews.text: If you are a small person this might fit but I am larger & it is too small.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Miller

customer_reviews.title: This fits like an x-large just so everyone knows
customer_reviews.text: This fits like an x-large just so everyone knows. If you are smaller it still looks like an oversized cute kimono and if you wear an x-large normally, it should still completely cover you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color is like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Color is like the picture. Size seems a bit large but that's ok it's a kimono it's suppose to be a bit big. Overall it's a great find for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Rans

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't have loved this anymore than I do!! Super lightweight and great quality especially for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley shelton

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I was hoping it was longer though. Im short and it barely came beyond my bum. Cute
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: ... as xl and it fit and hung just right like any kikono
customer_reviews.text: I wear as xl and it fit and hung just right like any kikono. 5 stars and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Bf

customer_reviews.title: Hood in June will love all the flags
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure the soldiers at Ft. Hood in June will love all the flags.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Stephens

customer_reviews.title: USA
customer_reviews.text: Proud to own this piece!! It better than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: It fits very well through the shoulders but wasn't as long as I thought it would be. I am 6 feet tall so I do have trouble finding anything long enough....it did the job though. Long enough to wear with leggings!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected but it worked for the occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase! Exactly how it was described
customer_reviews.text: Good purchase! Exactly how it was described. I am 5’4” and it goes to about my knees. I am a curvy woman and this is plenty big!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: Wore this to a concert and received SOOOOO many compliments on it!!! Absolutely love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Luster

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love the design but not a huge fan of the material.
customer_reviews.author: Montana

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about buying this kimono but I'm so glad I did I'm an American size 14 about 210 lb and this fit me perfectly not too big not too small
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Everyone wants one
customer_reviews.text: The texture of the fabric is quite unique - love it. It is light an flowy and yet takes the chill off when in those air conditioned rooms. I have worn it 3 times and each time have had a stranger stop to ask me where I got the top - high compliments!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!! The picture makes it look thin ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy!! The picture makes it look thin, soft and flowy. It is thick and awkward. Not cute at all and not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize when I ordered it came from China, all their clothes run too small
customer_reviews.author: Penny Dailey

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our upcoming July 4th cruise to throw over anything from a bathing suit to shorts, to a long skirt for evening. It's well made and I love the print and vibrant colors.
customer_reviews.author: gma

product_meta.title: Angashion Women's American Flag Print Kimono Cover Up Tops Shirt
feature_bullets: Material: Polyster. 100% Brand New and high quality!
Style: American Flag Print, Casual Style, Loose, Cover Up, Kimono
Occasion: Spring, Summer, Autumn, Beach, Party, Date, Club, At home, Holiday
Pair with: This women's flag cardigan goes perfect with a cami shirt and shorts, and with sandals, slippers, or high heels.
